pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Zhen4 hua2 Gang3 kou3 Ji1 xie4

definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
